name: Rendez-vous in a Maze
description:
Make sure the two characters meet in the maze!

Controls:

  • You must control both characters using both hands (no multiplayer allowed!)
  • You can change the controls in the menu
  • Available controls:
    • For Left hand:
      • ZQSD (AZERTY)
      • WASD (QWERTY)
    • For Right hand:
      • IJKL
      • ARROWS
    • Controller is supported:
      • LEFT JOYSTICK
      • RIGHT JOYSTICK

Team:

  • Mistersyms - Audio
  • wRadion - Design & Code
  • VisionElf - Code

Credits:

Joystick icons from: NICE PNG
